subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: A new season opens Friday night, and redemption for the Knicks has never seemed more critical, especially after an Oct. 2 jury verdict that found Isiah Thomas and his bosses were liable for sexual harassment.
snippet: A new season opens Friday night, and redemption for the Knicks has never seemed more critical, especially after an Oct. 2 jury verdict that found Isiah Thomas and his bosses were liable for sexual harassment.
